oracle.jbo.server
Class QCPoolMgr

java.lang.Object
  oracle.jbo.pool.ResourcePoolManager
      oracle.jbo.server.QCPoolMgr

public class QCPoolMgr
extends ResourcePoolManager

This class manages the shared Query Collection Pool. It is a singleton instance.
